# gitea_repositories (Data Source)

Fetches a list of repositories. Can list repos for a user, organization, or search all repos.



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Optional

- `org` (String) Organization to list repositories for (mutually exclusive with username and search)
- `search` (String) Search query for repositories (mutually exclusive with username and org)
- `username` (String) Username to list repositories for (mutually exclusive with org and search)

### Read-Only

- `repositories` (Attributes List) List of repositories (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--repositories))

<a id="nestedatt--repositories"></a>
### Nested Schema for `repositories`

Read-Only:

- `clone_url` (String) Clone URL of the repository
- `description` (String) Repository description
- `fork` (Boolean) Whether the repository is a fork
- `full_name` (String) Full name (owner/name)
- `html_url` (String) HTML URL of the repository
- `id` (Number) Repository ID
- `mirror` (Boolean) Whether the repository is a mirror
- `name` (String) Repository name
- `owner` (String) Repository owner
- `private` (Boolean) Whether the repository is private
- `ssh_url` (String) SSH URL of the repository
